description.narrative: The project development objective is to modernize payments infrastructure and increase availability of term financing to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs).

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work program | Description :The Government shall, no later than November 30 in each calendar year duringProject implementation, prepare and furnish to the Association, a program of activities for inclusion in the Project during thefollowing calendar year. | Due Date :30-Nov-of each year to the closing of the project.

Finance Agreement :Corrective actions after Mid-term review | Description :The Recipient shall, following the Mid-Term Review, actpromptly and diligently in order to take any corrective action deemed necessary to remedy any shortcoming noted in theimplementation of the Project and to implement such other measures as may have been agreed upon with the Association in furtheranceof the objectives of the Project. | Due Date :31-Oct-2017

Finance Agreement :Financial Statements | Description :The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited in accordance withthe provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. each audit shall cover the period of one fiscal year of theRecipient, commencing with the fiscal year in which the first withdrawal was made. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Financial management | Description :The Recipient shall maintain a financial management system in accordancewith the provisions of Section 4.09 of the General Conditions and shall prepare and furnish to the Association not later than 45days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter, in form andsubstance acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Mid-term review | Description :Carry out a comprehensive mid-term review of the Project during which it shallexchange views with the Association generally on allmatters relating to the progress of the Project and the performance by theRecipient of its obligations under the Financing Agreement. | Due Date :30-Sep-2017

Finance Agreement :Proceeds made available to FPM ASBL | Description :The Government shall, within three months after theEffectiveness Date, make part of the proceeds of the Financing allocated from time to time to Category (1) of the table SectionIV.A.2 of Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement available to FPM ASBL under a microfinance contract between the Recipient and FPMASBL, under terms and conditions approved by the Association. | Due Date :18-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Coordination Unit | Description :The MOF Project Coordination Unit (PCU) to run day-to-day management,implementation and coordination of the Project, with staffing, terms of reference, composition and powers acceptable to theAssociation, and the PCU is maintained. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Operations Manual | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with theProject Operations Manual (POM) and the POM is maintained. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Reports | Description :The Recipient shall prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisions ofSection 4.08 of the General Conditions and on the basis of indicators set forth in the POM and found acceptable to the Association.Each Project Report shall cover the period of one calendar semester, and shall be furnished to the Association not later than onemonth after the end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :The BCC Implementation Unit | Description :The BCC Unit to run day-to-day management, implementation andcoordination of the Components 1 and 2.1 of the Project, with staffing, terms of reference, composition and powers acceptable tothe Association, and the Team is maintained. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
